title: Devourer Yi
body:
You what's OP? A fed Yi. And not just any Yi - Devourer Yi, oh my jebus he's a god that shreds tanks (I think, i'll play him a bit more against tanks to find out), destroys ADCs and downright melts monsters. He's my new favorite champ.

My build for him - Sated Devourer, Wit's end, Bork, Black Cleaver, Bloodthirster, AS Boots w/ homeguard. 

This is a pretty silly build but it's just so much fun to play Yi with.

If you don't think he's just down right OP, try him out in norms

Pls rito don't nerf ty <3

Also pls no h8 im only stating my thoughts on Yi with that build ty <3<3

Devourer {{champion:11}} OP
